* All package action in WCM start from {{delivery}} folder, so let's go to this folder first
{code}
	$ cd ecms/delivery
{code}

h1. Package WCM standalone version - Tomcat bundle
{code}
	$ cd wcm/assembly
	$ mvn clean install
{code}


h1. Package WCM with workflow enabled - Tomcat bundle
{code}
	$ cd wkf-wcm/assembly
	$ mvn clean install
{code}

h1. Make WCM EAR packages to run with jBoss

* Make WCM extension EAR
{code}
	$ cd packaging/wcm/ear
	$ mvn clean install
{code}

* Make WCM demo sites EAR
{code}
	$ cd packaging/ecmdemo/ear
	$ mvn clean install
{code}

* Make workflow EAR
{code}
	$ cd packaging/workflow/ear
	$ mvn clean install
{code}
